data.what_is:
Upsales helps B2B companies find new leads and win more deals. Our customers increase sales by 22% in the first year using our revenue growth platform  

Our products: 
- Sales & CRM
- Marketing Automation
- Company Data Hub
- Revenue & Order Management
- Revenue Analytics
- Customer Support & Project Management
data.product_description: Upsales is a SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) designed to help B2B-companies drive sales and attract new customers.
data.supported_languages: Danish, German, English, Finnish, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish

plan_features: Import ERP data to maximise your trial

pricing_plans.plan_price:
Contact Us
1 Platform fee + number of users

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 32 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 33 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 33 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 23 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 21 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Document & Content Mgmt.
features.content: As reported in 26 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews. Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 34 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 24 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Contact & Account Management
features.content: Based on 83 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Store and retrieve information associated to customer contacts and accounts.  Track company-wide communication and information about contacts and accounts.

features.name: Partner Relationship Mgmt. (PRM)
features.content: Manage partners by tracking channel partner leads and sales opportunities.   Provide a partner portal to collaborate with channels on sales opportunities and to share product, pricing, quoting, ordering, and training information 52 reviewers of Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.
features.content: Based on 80 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.

features.name: Task / Activity Management
features.content: Based on 85 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.

features.name: Territory & Quota Management
features.content: Based on 59 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.

features.name: Desktop Integration
features.content: Based on 61 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.

features.name: Product & Price List Management
features.content: Based on 63 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.

features.name: Quote & Order Management
features.content: Based on 64 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.

features.name: Customer Contract Management
features.content: Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution. This feature was mentioned in 62 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews.

features.name: Email Marketing
features.content: Based on 63 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.

features.name: Campaign Management
features.content: Based on 58 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.

features.name: Lead Management
features.content: Based on 63 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.

features.name: Marketing ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 42 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities

features.name: Case ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: As reported in 52 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews. Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.

features.name: Customer Support Portal
features.content: Based on 36 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews. Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.

features.name: Call Center Features
features.content: As reported in 47 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews. Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.

features.name: Support Analytics
features.content: Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools. 32 reviewers of Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 35 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 28 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Mobile User Support
features.content: Based on 50 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.

features.name: Reporting
features.content: Based on 67 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.

features.name: Dashboards
features.content: Based on 76 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization's Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance

features.name: Forecasting
features.content: Based on 65 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 26 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 25 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 17 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 21 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 28 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 30 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 28 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 26 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 22 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 13 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 24 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 23 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 19 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 25 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 22 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 21 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 21 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 22 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 20 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 20 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 24 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: AI Text Generation
features.content: Allows users to generate text based on a text prompt. This feature was mentioned in 10 Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform reviews.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Webbplatsen har en stilren och modern design som ar latt att navigera. Fargskalan ar enkel med blatt och vitt, vilket skapar ett professionellt utseende och kansla. Innehallet ar valskrivet och informativt, vilket ger potentiella kunder en forstaelse for hur Upsales kan gynna deras verksamhet.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Brist pa prisinformation. Aven om detta inte nodvandigtvis ar en deal-breaker, kanske manga potentiella kunder vill veta vad de kan forvanta sig att betala innan de bestammer sig for en demo eller gratis provperiod.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform ar utformad for att hjalpa foretag att forbattra sina forsaljnings- och marknadsforingsprocesser genom att tillhandahalla en uppsattning verktyg och funktioner som mojliggor mer effektiv generering av potentiella kunder, fostran och konvertering.

Ineffektiv generering av leads: Ett vanligt problem for foretag ar att de kampar for att generera hogkvalitativa leads som sannolikt kommer att omvandlas till kunder. Merforsaljning hjalper till att losa detta problem genom att tillhandahalla en rad verktyg for att generera potentiella kunder, sasom webbformular, chatbots och malsidor, som kan fanga information om potentiella kunder och utlosa automatiska uppfoljningsatgarder.

Brist pa insyn i saljprocessen: Ett annat vanligt problem ar att foretag kanske inte har en tydlig bild av sin forsaljningspipeline, vilket gor det svart att spara framsteg, identifiera flaskhalsar och prioritera forsaljningsaktiviteter. Upsales tillhandahaller en visuell forsaljningspipeline som gor det mojligt for foretag att spara potentiella kunder och affarer i varje skede av forsaljningsprocessen, fran forsta kontakt till sluten vunnen eller forlorad.

Ineffektivt salj- och marknadsforingssamarbete: Nar salj- och marknadsforingsteam inte ar samordnade kan det leda till ineffektivitet, missade mojligheter och bristande ansvarsskyldighet. Merforsaljning hjalper till att underlatta battre samarbete mellan salj- och marknadsforingsteam genom att tillhandahalla en centraliserad plattform for hantering av leads och affarer, samt verktyg for att spara marknadsforingskampanjresultat och avkastning pa investeringen.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Enkelheten. Det mesta talar for sig sjalv och utan utbildning sa forstar jag verktyget och ser nyttan snabbt. Den har ett helhetstank som jag gillar dar det mesta ar samlat.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Som inledningsvis har jag relativt ny och inte hunnit utforska allt. I och med min inriktning pa marknadsforing har jag framst hallt mig inom den ramen. Har gar det nog att gora mer an vad jag bade tror och vet. Delvis skulle jag vilja kunna badda in Upsales, for kunder i externt bruk pa var nuvarande hemsida. initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
It's easy to use, and the help from customer support is excellent. It has a connection with Fortnox, which is great. Easy to find the customers in the database. We tried a few other CRM systems before choosing Upsales, and this system was much better than the others we tried. One of the best things is that scheduled phone calls appear in the app. I can call from the app and then go directly to the next call.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
The price is a bit higher than the competitors. You can only integrate email and calendar with Office 365 or Gmail. We use the English version, and sometimes there are words in Swedish that my American colleague doesn't understand.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Keeping track of our customers, quotes and sales funnel. Easy to plan tasks, phone calls and meetings and not double book.

initial_reviews.review_title: Upsales - outstanding CRM out of the box for B2B in the Nordic Countries
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Upsales is a out of the box, quickstarted CRM, with great capabilities. As a B2B-facing company working in Scandinavia/Nordics, we get all the functionality we need without the need for complex adaptations. Great support for both technical and user based issues!

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Some functions within the subscription module is not as flexible and developed as the ones in opportunities and sales. I.E to be able to save files and create tasks. Since this is a minor function, it is not a major problem.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Smart and intuitive UI, easy to start a sales group, where a CRM often is hard to implement, Upsales quickly enables an organization to have a really powerful CRM that salespeople actually likes.

Webbplatsen har en stilren och modern design som ar latt att navigera. Fargskalan ar enkel med blatt och vitt, vilket skapar ett professionellt utseende och kansla. Innehallet ar valskrivet och informativt, vilket ger potentiella kunder en forstaelse for hur Upsales kan gynna deras verksamhet.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Brist pa prisinformation. Aven om detta inte nodvandigtvis ar en deal-breaker, kanske manga potentiella kunder vill veta vad de kan forvanta sig att betala innan de bestammer sig for en demo eller gratis provperiod.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform ar utformad for att hjalpa foretag att forbattra sina forsaljnings- och marknadsforingsprocesser genom att tillhandahalla en uppsattning verktyg och funktioner som mojliggor mer effektiv generering av potentiella kunder, fostran och konvertering.

Ineffektiv generering av leads: Ett vanligt problem for foretag ar att de kampar for att generera hogkvalitativa leads som sannolikt kommer att omvandlas till kunder. Merforsaljning hjalper till att losa detta problem genom att tillhandahalla en rad verktyg for att generera potentiella kunder, sasom webbformular, chatbots och malsidor, som kan fanga information om potentiella kunder och utlosa automatiska uppfoljningsatgarder.

Brist pa insyn i saljprocessen: Ett annat vanligt problem ar att foretag kanske inte har en tydlig bild av sin forsaljningspipeline, vilket gor det svart att spara framsteg, identifiera flaskhalsar och prioritera forsaljningsaktiviteter. Upsales tillhandahaller en visuell forsaljningspipeline som gor det mojligt for foretag att spara potentiella kunder och affarer i varje skede av forsaljningsprocessen, fran forsta kontakt till sluten vunnen eller forlorad.

Ineffektivt salj- och marknadsforingssamarbete: Nar salj- och marknadsforingsteam inte ar samordnade kan det leda till ineffektivitet, missade mojligheter och bristande ansvarsskyldighet. Merforsaljning hjalper till att underlatta battre samarbete mellan salj- och marknadsforingsteam genom att tillhandahalla en centraliserad plattform for hantering av leads och affarer, samt verktyg for att spara marknadsforingskampanjresultat och avkastning pa investeringen.

Upsales is a out of the box, quickstarted CRM, with great capabilities. As a B2B-facing company working in Scandinavia/Nordics, we get all the functionality we need without the need for complex adaptations. Great support for both technical and user based issues!

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Some functions within the subscription module is not as flexible and developed as the ones in opportunities and sales. I.E to be able to save files and create tasks. Since this is a minor function, it is not a major problem.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Smart and intuitive UI, easy to start a sales group, where a CRM often is hard to implement, Upsales quickly enables an organization to have a really powerful CRM that salespeople actually likes.

all_reviews.review_title: Ett komplett CRM som klarar det mesta
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Fordelen med Upsales ar att det ar sa komplett. Det kan tillfredsstalla behoven som finns bade hos sma foretag, och hos lite storre. Man kan variera integrationerna gentemot ovriga system, vilket underlattar anvandandet av CRM:et i HELA organisationen. Aven ekonomi och fakturering.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Graden av komplexitet gor att systemet inte ar sa intuitivt. Det ar svart att anvanda som prospekteringsverktyg. Det ar svart att jobba med mallar och utskick till kunder pa ett smidigt satt. De flesta  saker (som man inte gor dagligen) tenderar att ta valdigt lang tid att gora. Det tar helt enkelt tid att lara sig nya moment. Samma sak med uppfoljningar, och andringar gentemot andra system (fortnox). sana ar svara att gora snabbt.
En stor nackdel ar alltsa ocksa att CRM:et kraver en del av sin anvandare.
Jamfor man med  LimeGo sa ar det i enklaste laget, men fordelen ar att en ny anvandare ar igang pa 10 minuter och dessutom i princip utan att man behover ga igenom systemet med vederborande. Jamforelsevis ar det ocksa valdigt mycket smidigare att anvanda i sin prospektering av nya kunder.

Tva omraden som Upsales skulle behova forbattra ar:
1. gor prospektering smidigare. Underlatta for en saljare att lagga till kunduppgifter i CRM:et utan att det blir en merkostnad for arbetsgivaren.
2. gor utskick - bade enstaka och flera - enklare.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Utskick kan hanteras direkt gnm CRM:et - och delvis valideras. Liksom en del av prospekteringen. Sammantaget leder det till okad effektivitet, okad kontroll och darmed ocksa att man sparar en del tid. Men att Upsales lamnar en del kvar att onska ar helt klart - vi jobbar till exempel fortfarande med kundlistor/prospektlistor  i Excel darfor att vi uppfattar det som tydligare, enklare och mer snabbfotat. Idealet hade varit ifall Upsales varit sa pass smidigt att vi kunnat jobba aven med kundlistor och prospekteringslistor direkt i Upsales.

Man kan variera integrationerna gentemot ovriga system, vilket underlattar anvandandet av CRM:et i HELA organisationen. Aven ekonomi och fakturering.

review_question_answers.answer:
Graden av komplexitet gor att systemet inte ar sa intuitivt. Det ar svart att anvanda som prospekteringsverktyg. Det ar svart att jobba med mallar och utskick till kunder pa ett smidigt satt. De flesta  saker (som man inte gor dagligen) tenderar att ta valdigt lang tid att gora. Det tar helt enkelt tid att lara sig nya moment. Samma sak med uppfoljningar, och andringar gentemot andra system (fortnox). sana ar svara att gora snabbt.
En stor nackdel ar alltsa ocksa att CRM:et kraver en del av sin anvandare.
Jamfor man med  LimeGo sa ar det i enklaste laget, men fordelen ar att en ny anvandare ar igang pa 10 minuter och dessutom i princip utan att man behover ga igenom systemet med vederborande. Jamforelsevis ar det ocksa valdigt mycket smidigare att anvanda i sin prospektering av nya kunder.

Tva omraden som Upsales skulle behova forbattra ar:
1. gor prospektering smidigare. Underlatta for en saljare att lagga till kunduppgifter i CRM:et utan att det blir en merkostnad for arbetsgivaren.
2. gor utskick - bade enstaka och flera - enklare.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Utskick kan hanteras direkt gnm CRM:et - och delvis valideras. Liksom en del av prospekteringen. Sammantaget leder det till okad effektivitet, okad kontroll och darmed ocksa att man sparar en del tid. Men att Upsales lamnar en del kvar att onska ar helt klart - vi jobbar till exempel fortfarande med kundlistor/prospektlistor  i Excel darfor att vi uppfattar det som tydligare, enklare och mer snabbfotat. Idealet hade varit ifall Upsales varit sa pass smidigt att vi kunnat jobba aven med kundlistor och prospekteringslistor direkt i Upsales.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Upsales provides tools for all our daily sales processes & helps to collaborate with our teams so that we can effectively promote sales through the full sales cycle. Using its advanced filter options we can segregate and have a clear view even if we huge amount of data is involved. It can also generate & upload leads, track all our daily sales activities and integrate seamlessly with other applications for receiving notifications on a real-time basis.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Nothing in particular to dislike about the services offered by Upsales. It helps us notify on our orders, booked appointments and other opportunities through its integration with Microsoft Teams. It also aids us to analyze our sales history & provides effective recommendations on smart action plans for closing deals.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Upsales is beneficial in saving a lot of time while managing our sales lifecycle. We can customize our deals pipeline as per our client's expectations through its fields & attributes sections. We can easily track our customer emails, sales flow and important meetings in a single pane of glass thanks to the Upsales platform. It also provides valuable insights between project work & recurring work from which we gain clear observability of our orders.

The main thing it solves is our ability to process leads. We can often be 5-15 sales agents contacting one company, and it gives us a very good overview of who's doing what. The activity types also help, since we have clear guidelines for when we can and cannot contact a lead.

all_reviews.review_title: Bra och enkelt CRM och Marknadssystem
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Vi har nu anvant Upsales i 5 manader. Under perioden har vi haft mycket bra support bade fran den allmanna supporten och aven bra fran var kontaktperson. Under perioden har vi anstallt fler saljare och det har aldrig varit nagra problem med att fa extra utbildning ifran Upsales.

Jag och saljarna anvander systemet dagligen och det ar ett mycket bra hjalpmedel for var avdelning. Bade nar det galler att hitta nya prospekt att ta kontakt med och aven uppfoljning av befintliga kunder. Bade saljare och jag har full koll pa var aktivitetsniva och var pipeline vilket gor att vi snabbt ser vart vi ska lagga vara resurser.

Var marknadsavdelning anvander systemets marknadsfunktion som ger en bra overblick over inkommande lead som vi enkelt kan tilldela vara saljare. Genom systemets formular sa kan vi snabbt och enkelt skicka ut inbjudningar till event och folja upp bade anmalningar och kundundersokningar efter avslutat event.

Vi har tittat pa flera system innan vi valde Upsales men valet foll pa enkelheten tillsammans med helheten som systemet erbjuder.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Har inte hittat nagot an men som med alla program sa finns det sakert utvecklingsmojligheter.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Snabbt och enkelt skapa och fylla i aktiveter hos kunder och prospekt. Uppfoljning bade for mig som ledare och for saljare for att snabbt hitta ratt vag framat.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
The solution is suitable for B2B organizations looking for integrated Marketing Automation & CRM. It provides a 360 customer view and makes it possible to create different marketing campaigns based on the customer journey stage.

It has easy-to-use CRM functionalities. Its many integrations with, for example, Gmail and Google calendar, make it easy to register different sales activities and saves many administration hours.

It has most of the functionalities that both Sales and Marketing departments need and provides a good set of tools to make automated marketing communication and follow marketing activities in order to measure ROI.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
The campaign builder tool is not so advanced. It is not possible to make random segments for A/B testing and the scoring model is a bit limited.
There is a risk of ending up with duplicates as the company name is a key, and if a lead fills a marketing form writing another version of the company name, it will result in a duplicate company card. There are some good functions to manage duplicates in the system anyhow.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Integrated sales & marketing

all_reviews.review_title: A solid and complete software to manage marketing projects
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Upsales CRM is a software designed to serve agencies by offering comprehensive solutions for social marketing, budgeting and proposals, call management, territories and channel management from a single point. It has Upsales for your organization to optimize the management processes of managing potential customers, includes other extremely important functions such as leadership management, field sales management and management of opportunities that are extremely useful functions for any agency, I must also emphasize the ease with which you can develop marketing campaigns using upsales because you do not need to be an expert to work with the functions provided by this great platform and finally we have its technical support which provides clear and rapid response

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Within the main disadvantage that was achieved within this tool was the high cost of its service, also mobile applications are almost useless nothing like the web domain, the cloud or SaaS, despite offering a large number of tools lacks collaboration functions, there are also few integrations with social networks which is really very negative taking into account that it is an application for marketing management and most customers that are captured today are through social networks such as Instagram, Twitter and Facebook

Recommendations to others considering Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform:
Firstly Upsales is a platform with a high cost for small organizations and its price is aimed at large companies for which if I recommend using Upsales because it is a platform designed to manage large databases, the software is simple to use all the information is provided by the technical support and the many options for help that has this one of the reasons why I recommend this software and finally also recommend it for the ease with which you can manage marketing campaigns

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Upsales has been a great solution for many of the needs that are presented to us in the marketing and sales departments despite having some negative things we have been able to carry out marketing campaigns, manage calls, do social marketing, manage contacts and manage the database of our customers a lot of functions that are really important to us who are a relatively large organization and that is why we decided to stay with Upsales because in the past we worked with other CRM software that simply could not handle a database of so large and another reason was the facilities provided by this program to manage a full cycle of sales

all_reviews.review_title: An excellent CRM for those looking evolve their sales.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
For me, a dynamic and interesting interface is the most important thing when choosing your CRM. Upsales does this seamlessly. From functions like an easy way to store your prospects and clients to exceptional data export for admins.
Upsales creates an opportunity for every salesman and company to follow up the process from lead to deal better than any other similar product I have tried.
One of the best functions Upsales has to offer is the ability to use the flash mode. This helps the individual tunnel vision the sales and not get distracted by other things and waste time trying to find "the perfect lead to call".
Overall, Upsales is a great tool sure to help you on your road to becoming the best salesperson you can be.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
I've found that there is a slight lack in ways to store new prospects you have yet to reach out to or get an answer from. Having a function called "New leads/prospects" would greatly improve the platform and further eliminate the need to look for the right lead to move on.

Recommendations to others considering Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform:
Instead of using follow-up activites - Just move the date of your activity and make a note using your signature.

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Most of all Upsales has helped me with storing data of previous contacts with leads.
It doesn't matter if you in ten years have not called a lead. If you have at some point talked to them and made thorough notes on how the call went, what type of person you spoke to and how the company is operating. You can pick the lead up at any time and make another call more prepared, whether it be months or years apart.

all_reviews.review_title: A modern CRM that really contributes
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
This is the second time, as Sales Manager, I buy Upsales CRM for my organization after using and testing several CRMs.
Combines simplicity, design and function in an excellent way, which I Think few CRM is capable of in the same way.
Drives sales processes in a structured way with great overview and gives me as a Sales Manager a very adaptable follow-up tool based on our needs and measurement Points.
Always close to good and quick support.
Love the extra add-on with webinars an education.

What do you dislike about Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform?
Can't really Think of anything at the moment.
Not the cheapest CRM but on the other hand it's not just a nice design either. As with all CRM, the experience depends a lot on what you put into it and how it is used.

Recommendations to others considering Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform:
Go for the full version with Marketing Automation

What problems is Upsales Sales and Marketing Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Full control of our sales process and sales forecast.
We do not need to have several different systems for sales tracking and marketing activities and quickly get an overview of which prospects and customers are hot and cold.
Streamlines our sales and marketing efforts.
Helps us to work closer between sales and markets, which is a must today.

Nothing major at all. Some added features like workflow with checks and balances in an opportunity would be a nice added extra and would take the system from Great to Amazing.

It has also given us a complete system to handle marketing automation and minimized manual labour. I could try listing all the benefits but then I would be writing for the next couple of hours and you would be reading as long.
